Package Handler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuctionHandler
    Handler for database requests regarding auctions.
    BidHandler
    Class for handling all database logic regarding bidding
    CreditCardHandler
    Class for handling the credit card database crud operations
    DatabaseHandler
    Handles storing Database information and the creation of new database connections
    EncryptionHandler
    Class used to handle credit card encryption.
    LoginHandler
    Class login, used to query the database with the user requested username,hashed password.
    MailHandler  
    RegisterHandler
    Register Class, used to connect and query the database the check if the request username/email the user wishes to register, also provides functionality to insert the requested user into the database.
